banner.title: Spanning Southeast Asia, Entrusted with Confidence
banner.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience in cross-border logistics, we have built a global service network covering more than 10 key hubs including Shenzhen, Guangzhou, and Hong Kong, processing 500+ standard containers daily and reaching 220+ countries through 60+ international routes. From traditional freight forwarding to digital logistics ecosystem, we always adhere to the business philosophy of "Compliance First, Efficiency Supreme", ensuring every shipment crosses mountains and seas.

air_freight.title: International Air Freight
air_freight.description: Providing routes to all major airports worldwide, our professional air freight team ensures your cargo arrives safely and on time.

sea_freight.title: International Sea Freight
sea_freight.description: Covering major ports worldwide, offering diverse shipping services including FCL and LCL.

lcl_shipping.title: LCL Shipping
lcl_shipping.description: Providing economical transportation solutions for small batches of goods with flexible shipping schedules.

customs_clearance.title: Professional Customs Clearance
customs_clearance.description: Our professional team assists in handling complex customs procedures to ensure smooth clearance of your goods.

pickup_service.title: Door-to-Door Pickup
pickup_service.description: Providing door-to-door service with our professional logistics team picking up your goods, saving you time and effort.

insurance_service.title: Insurance Services
insurance_service.description: Offering comprehensive cargo insurance solutions to provide extra protection for your goods.

one_stop_service.title: One-Stop Service
one_stop_service.description: From pickup, transportation to customs clearance and distribution, we provide one-stop solutions for all your logistics needs.

fast_delivery.title: Fast Air Freight
fast_delivery.description: Our efficient transportation network ensures your goods reach their destination as quickly as possible.

mission_accomplished.title: Mission Accomplished
mission_accomplished.description: We promise that no matter what difficulties we encounter, we will ensure your goods are delivered safely.

professional.title: Professional Service
professional.description: With years of industry experience, our professional team provides you with the highest quality logistics services.

trustworthy.title: Trustworthy
trustworthy.description: Having served many well-known enterprises over the years, we have earned a high level of trust from our clients.

peace_of_mind.title: Peace of Mind
peace_of_mind.description: Track the status of your goods throughout the entire process, allowing you to stay informed about your cargo's status, worry-free.

smart.title: Smart Logistics Platform
smart.subtitle: Digital Empowerment, Smart Logistics First
smart.description: Helinguoji's self-developed smart logistics platform achieves full-process visualization tracking, intelligent path planning, automatic document processing, and other functions, greatly improving logistics efficiency and reducing operating costs.

logistics_partner.title: Your Logistics Partner
logistics_partner.subtitle: Safeguarding Your Business
logistics_partner.description: Helinguoji Logistics is committed to being your most reliable logistics partner. Whether you are a cross-border e-commerce business, traditional foreign trade company, or manufacturing enterprise, we can provide you with the most suitable logistics solutions.

case_studies.title: Case Studies
case_studies.subtitle: Our Service Footprint
case_studies.description: Over the years, Helinguoji Logistics has provided quality logistics services to many well-known enterprises, helping them solve various logistics challenges and improve supply chain efficiency.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Always Here to Support You
contact.address: Room 502, Building B1, Digital Technology Park, High-tech South 7th Road, Nanshan District, Shenzhen
